title: Do I get my LP if I go against a scripter? and can you please review this guys games.

embed.description: Moincheligis / Platinum 3 100LP / 21W 3L Win Ratio 88% / Kog'Maw - 18W 2L Win Ratio 90%, Draven - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%

body: He's scripting, do I just lose my LP for an unwinnable game

replies.body:
Our systems will be able to pick up on scripting rather well, but if you suspect it might be missed make sure you use the built-in report feature in the post-game lobby. That will submit all the data we need to take action, otherwise, it can be hard to "build a case" if you will. 

Always make sure to submit official reports through the client, but if you're worried it'll be missed feel free to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a replay highlighting where you think scripting occurred.
Yes, you will lose LP for a loss, even if against a scripter. The likelihood of having your LP "replaced" is unknown. Never seen it happen before so I wouldn't get my hopes up. Best of luck though
